name: OpenClaw on DigitalOcean
tagline: Deploy your personal AI assistant with WhatsApp, Telegram, and Gmail
description: A complete setup for OpenClaw on a DigitalOcean droplet. Includes remote installation, swap optimization, and guided setup for WhatsApp (with dedicated number), Telegram bot, and Gmail Pub/Sub integration.

credits.name: OpenClaw
credits.description: OpenClaw is a personal AI assistant. This rig automates the official DigitalOcean deployment guide and adds channel setup for WhatsApp, Telegram, and Gmail.

whatItDoes: Deploys OpenClaw on a DigitalOcean droplet ($6/month) with full messaging integration. The installer runs from your local machine, SSHs into the droplet, installs OpenClaw with systemd persistence, and walks you through connecting WhatsApp (with a dedicated number), Telegram (via BotFather), and Gmail (via Pub/Sub). After setup, your AI assistant responds on all three channels.
useCases: Personal AI assistant accessible via WhatsApp, Telegram, and email
Always-on AI that runs 24/7 on a cheap VPS
Private alternative to cloud AI assistants
